meanings.definition: Used to make a polite request or to express courtesy.
meanings.sent2: Please say thank you when someone helps you.
meanings.sent4: Please imagine a world where everyone says please.
meanings.sent5: Please remember to always say please and thank you.

meanings.definition: To be the will of; to give pleasure or satisfaction to.
meanings.sent1: Can you please help me carry these bags?
meanings.sent2: I will please my mom by cleaning my room without being asked.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to please the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The chef's delicious food will please even the pickiest eaters.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful music will please your ears and soothe your soul.
